cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure on March 24, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 610, San Francisco Bay Restoration Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SPEIER:
H.R. 610.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article 1, Section 8 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H253]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

title: San Francisco Bay Restoration Act
